channel.title: BattleScape Server Progress
channel.description:
[i]Recent Updates[/i] Certain Npcs attack eachother! Full prayer has just been added, with the exception of rapid restore. Npcs will no longer walk through players or other npcs. This is helpful for things such as the fight cave Although this really ins't a noticable update, I have spent a good half hour making the server strongly hack and crash proof, although not 100%, pretty close :) It also now writes any errors to a log file for me, asumming there ever will be one. So if the server crashes, I'll know what caused it. The fire cape inventory and equip image has been updated.
[URL=http://video.tinypic.com/fullsize_video.php?v=63b737o&width=640&height=530]Some Npcs Fully Attack Eathother![/URL]
[URL=http://video.tinypic.com/fullsize_video.php?v=4r24pkn&width=640&height=530]Better Magic System Than Before[/URL]
[URL=http://video.tinypic.com/fullsize_video.php?v=6gwivxc&width=640&height=530]Fully Working Prayer[/URL]
[URL=http://video.tinypic.com/fullsize_video.php?v=4lyusm9&width=640&height=530]Two HeadIcon Sets Work Great[/URL]
[URL=http://video.tinypic.com/fullsize_video.php?v=62hs7xj&width=640&height=530]The Trade Bug Has Been Destroyed![/URL]
headIcons: [IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/9643/headiconip3.gif[/img]
The sweet game frame: [img]http://img456.imageshack.us/img456/4343/clientjg8.gif[/img]
Full appearance for guys and girls for the new items :) [img]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/8406/fullappaq2.gif[/img]
Npcs and players can fully range and mage: [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4690/npcrangenq9.gif[/img]
Some examples of all Npc attack emotes: [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/2995/npcatkgm4.gif[/img]

item.title: BattleScape Server Progress
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

go into your npc handler, and where the in attackplayer(int add something like:

plr.GetBlockEmote();

It varies alot though so it just depends on your source really though.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Server Progress
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

Recent Updates
Certain Npcs attack eachother!
Full prayer has just been added, with the exception of rapid restore.
Npcs will no longer walk through players or other npcs. This is helpful for things such as the fight cave
Although this really ins’t a noticable update, I have spent a good half hour making the server strongly hack and crash proof, although not 100%, pretty close It also now writes any errors to a log file for me, asumming there ever will be one. So if the server crashes, I’ll know what caused it.
The fire cape inventory and equip image has been updated.

Some Npcs Fully Attack Eathother!

Better Magic System Than Before

Fully Working Prayer

Two HeadIcon Sets Work Great

The Trade Bug Has Been Destroyed!
